name: Productive Game Prototype
description:
This Productive Game Prototype is a limited demonstration of a larger concept.

Add todos for your real world tasks; like taking out the trash, brushing your teeth, doing the dishes, or any thing that you need to do. Then as you check-off those tasks, you receive build points. You can then use those Build Points to build the game levels, by clicking "Build Game". Once a level is built, you can then play that level using the arrow keys.

To increase the amount of build points you receive per todo, increase your multiplier.

You can edit your todos, or make your todos repeating todos, from the Task Screen.

More information is provided in the in-game instructions or the demonstration video.

Devlog and more can be found on http://productivegaming.com

Edit: For some reason the screenshots and the demonstration video don't display.

Here is a link to the demonstration video.
